home.title: A Boutique Events Company Based in London
home.content: Our services include event management, venue finding, meetings & conference management and overseas events.

about.content: Wisteria Club a boutique events company based in London that specialises in exceptional corporate events and private parties. Catering for all budgets, we provide a very personal bespoke service for our clients, ensuring every aspect of the event is created down to the finest detail. Our highly creative, experienced and supportive team work closely with clients to produce spectacular events, both in the UK and abroad.

footer.bottom_line: Wisteria Club - A Boutique Events Company Based in London
